short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool generates flash-cards for importing into Anki memorizing app (https://apps.ankiweb.net).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help us to get content from online dictionaries such as Oxford, Cambridge, Collins, LacViet, and Wiktionary and and generate flashcards for importing into Anki application.

Steps to use:
1. Install AnkiFlash add-on (on Anki application)
2. Install AnkiFlash extension (this one)
3. Choose expected transation (e.g. English to English) option
4. Start to generate flashcards with AnkiFlash
5. Import generated flashcards into Anki
